aboutSection.title: Explore Our Story
aboutSection.bannerDes: Ask for password to any staff
aboutSection.arcticalDes: Serving the Finest Tapas, Spanish and Latin American food Since 2003
aboutSection.artical: Nestled in the heart of Berlin, Mundo is more than just a tapas bar and Latin American restaurant – it's a culinary homage to the rich traditions of Spanish and Latin American cuisine. At Mundo, we believe in the transformative power of food, where every dish tells a story of heritage, love, and tradition.
aboutSection.artical2: Our journey begins with the recipes passed down from mothers and grandmothers – the unsung heroes who spent hours in the kitchen perfecting each dish with a touch of love. Here at Mundo, we honor their legacy by using only the freshest ingredients to craft authentic Spanish tapas that are true to their original recipes.
aboutSection.artical3: But our menu extends beyond tapas. We proudly offer a curated selection of classics from both Spanish and Latin American culinary traditions, alongside our own unique creations that blend traditional flavors with modern inspiration.
aboutSection.artical4: To complement your dining experience, we offer an array of excellent Spanish wines, many of which are personally imported to ensure authenticity and quality. Whether you're enjoying a casual evening with friends or celebrating a special occasion, our wines are carefully chosen to enhance the flavors of our dishes and elevate your dining experience.
aboutSection.artical5: Weekends and public holidays at Mundo are a celebration in themselves. We recommend reserving a table for the evening hours to ensure you don't miss out on the vibrant atmosphere and the opportunity to savor our culinary delights.
aboutSection.artical6: At Mundo, we are more than just a restaurant – we are a family passionate about sharing our love for Spanish and Latin American cuisine with you. From our kitchen to your table, we invite you to join us on a journey of flavors, tradition, and unforgettable moments.
aboutSection.artical7: Bienvenidos a Mundo – where every meal is a celebration of heritage and taste.

policy.leftArticle: At Mundo Tapas, we are dedicated to delivering an exceptional dining experience rooted in quality, tradition, and innovation. We use fresh, locally-sourced ingredients to ensure the highest quality and taste, while supporting our community. Our dishes are inspired by Spanish and Latin American culinary traditions and prepared with authentic spices and techniques. Prioritizing your health, we adhere to strict hygiene standards and the latest food safety protocols.
policy.leftArticle1: Our commitment to sustainability includes minimizing food waste and using eco-friendly packaging. While honoring traditional flavors, our chefs embrace new techniques and ingredients to create unique, delicious dishes. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we strive to make every visit memorable with our attentive service. Our food policy is our promise of quality, authenticity, and a vibrant culinary experience. ¡Bienvenidos a Mundo Tapas!
policy.rightArticle: At Mundo Tapas, our core policy is centered on delivering an exceptional dining experience by upholding the highest standards of quality, authenticity, and innovation. We are committed to using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients to ensure every dish bursts with flavor while supporting sustainable practices.
policy.rightArticle1: We prioritize the health and safety of our guests through stringent hygiene practices and food safety protocols. Additionally, we continually seek to innovate, blending traditional flavors with modern culinary techniques to create unique, memorable dishes. Customer satisfaction is at the heart of everything we do, and we strive to exceed your expectations with every visit. ¡Bienvenidos a Mundo Tapas!

serviceList.title: Mundo Tapas Bar in Alt Mariendorf, Checkpoint Charlie, and Potsdamer Platz
serviceList.introduction: Discover a vibrant culinary experience at Mundo Tapas Bar across our three iconic Berlin locations: Alt Mariendorf, Checkpoint Charlie, and Potsdamer Platz. Whether you're looking for a casual dine- in experience, catering services, or an unforgettable venue for private events, Mundo Tapas Bar has you covered.

services.title: Dine-In Experience
services.description: Enjoy a unique dining experience at any of our Mundo Tapas Bar locations, where we serve delicious tapas, international dishes, and curated drinks in a welcoming and stylish atmosphere. Our locations provide a relaxing environment perfect for casual lunches, dinners, and group dining experiences. Whether you're dining solo, with a partner, or celebrating with a group, our menu and ambiance cater to all tastes.

services.title: Catering Services – Perfect for Events
services.description: Planning a large event? Our catering services are available for groups of 40 people and above, providing a tailored menu featuring our signature tapas and international dishes. Let us bring the flavours of Mundo Tapas Bar to your corporate event, wedding, or private gathering. Whether you're hosting a family reunion, business meeting, or celebration, we offer seamless catering solutions to ensure your event is a success.

services.title: Events at Mundo Tapas Bar
services.description: Looking for the perfect venue to host your next private event? Mundo Tapas Bar in Alt Mariendorf, Checkpoint Charlie, and Potsdamer Platz is ideal for all kinds of celebrations, including: ** Birthday parties ** Anniversary parties ** Bachelor and bachelorette parties ** Wedding receptions ** Baby showers ** Corporate lunches and dinners ** Prom night parties ** Private parties ** Other group events With our customizable event spaces and attentive service, we make sure every detail of your special occasion is perfect. Whether you're hosting a small gathering or a large event, we offer personalized packages to suit your needs and ensure a memorable experience.

services.title: Exclusive to Mundo Tapas Bar – Alt Mariendorf
services.description: ### In addition to our regular services, Mundo Alt Mariendorf offers brunch buffet – “All You Can Eat” and breakfast options for those looking to start their day with a delicious spread of fresh dishes. ### Brunch Buffet & Breakfast at Mundo Alt Mariendorf Join us for our famous all-you-can-eat brunch buffet every Sunday and on holidays at Mundo Alt Mariendorf. ### Indulge in a wide selection of breakfast items, tapas, fresh fruit, pastries, and more. Perfect for a relaxing Sunday morning with friends or family. ### Our breakfast service is also available Monday to Saturday, offering an array of morning favourites with classic breakfast or international breakfast. Start your day with a hearty meal at Mundo Alt Mariendorf.

services.title: Why Choose Mundo Tapas Bar?
services.description: ** Authentic tapas dining experience across three prime Berlin locations ** Professional catering service for 40+ guests ** Ideal venues for private events, corporate gatherings, and group celebrations ** Exclusive brunch buffet and breakfast options at Alt Mariendorf ** Customized event packages and exceptional service ** Stylish, modern dining atmosphere with top-quality food and drinks

content.title: General information
content.details: The following information provides an overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you. Detailed information on data protection is provided in the privacy policy below.

content.title: Data collection on this website
content.details: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. Contact details are available in the website imprint.

content.title: How do we collect your data?
content.details: Your data is collected either when you provide it (e.g., via contact forms) or automatically by the website's IT systems (e.g., browser type, operating system, access time).

content.title: What do we use your data for?
content.details: Some data ensures the website's functionality, while other data may be used to analyze user behavior.

content.title: What rights do you have regarding your data?
content.details: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also request a restriction on its processing and lodge complaints with supervisory authorities.

content.title: External Hosting
content.details: This website is hosted by an external service provider. The personal data collected on this website is stored on the host's servers. This can include, among others, IP addresses, contact requests, meta and communication data, contract data, contact details, names, website access, and other data generated via a website.

content.title: Use of the Host
content.details: The host is used for the purpose of fulfilling the contract with our potential and existing customers (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR) and in the interest of a secure, fast, and efficient provision of our online offering by a professional provider (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR).

content.title: Data Processing by the Provider
content.details: Our host will only process your data to the extent necessary to fulfill its service obligations and follow our instructions regarding this data.

content.title: Provider Used
content.details: We use the following provider: MilesWeb Internet Services Pvt Ltd (www.milesweb.com).

content.title: Conclusion of a Contract for Order Processing
content.details: In order to ensure data protection-compliant processing, we have concluded a contract for order processing with our host.

content.title: Privacy policy
content.details: The operators of these sites take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this data protection declaration. When you use this website, various personal data is collected. Personal data is data that can be used to personally identify you. This data protection declaration explains what data we collect and what we use it for. It also explains how and for what purpose this happens. We would like to point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g. when communicating via email) can have security gaps. Complete protection of data from access by third parties is not possible.

content.title: Note on the responsible body
content.details: The responsible body for data processing on this website is: Mundo AKS II GmbH, Zimmerstrasse 19, 10969 Berlin. The responsible body is the natural or legal person who alone or jointly with others decides on the purposes and means of processing personal data (e.g. names, email addresses, etc.).

content.title: Revocation of your consent to data processing
content.details: Many data processing operations are only possible with your express consent. You can revoke any consent you have already given at any time. All you need to do is send us an informal email. The lawfulness of the data processing carried out until the revocation remains unaffected by the revocation.

content.title: Right to object to data collection in special cases and to direct advertising (Art. 21 GDPR)
content.details: If the data processing is based on Art. 6 Abs. 1 Liter. E or F GDPR, you have the right to object to the processing of your personal data at any time for reasons arising from your particular situation; this also applies to profiling based on these terms. The applicable legal basis on which processing is based can be found in this data protection policy. If you object, we will no longer process your affected personal data unless we can prove compelling reasons for the processing that outweigh your interests, rights, and freedoms or the processing is for the assertion, exercise or representation of legal claims (objection pursuant to Article 21(1) GDPR). If your personal data is processed for direct advertising, you have the right to object at any time to the processing of personal data concerning you for the purpose of such advertising; this also applies to profiling to the extent it is connected with such direct advertising. If you object, your personal data will no longer be used for the purpose of direct advertising (objection pursuant to Article 21(2) GDPR).

content.title: Right to lodge a complaint with the responsible supervisory authority
content.details: In the event of violations of the GDPR, those affected have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, in particular in the member state of their habitual residence, their place of work, or the place of the alleged violation. The right to lodge a complaint exists without prejudice to any other administrative or judicial remedies.

content.title: Right to data portability
content.details: You have the right to have data that we process automatically based on your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to a third party in a common, machine-readable format. If you request the data to be transferred directly to another person responsible, this will only be done if it is technically feasible.

content.title: SSL or TLS encryption
content.details: This site uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as orders or inquiries that you send to us as the site operator. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the browser address line changing from “http://” to “https://” and by the lock symbol in your browser line. If SSL or TLS encryption is activated, the data you transmit to us cannot be read by third parties.

content.title: Information, deletion, and correction
content.details: Within the framework of the applicable legal provisions, you have the right to free information at any time about your stored personal data, its origin and recipient, and the purpose of data processing and, if necessary, a right to correction or deletion of this data. You can contact us at any time at the address given in the legal notice for this purpose or for further questions on the subject of personal data.

content.title: Right to restriction of processing
content.details: You have the right to request that the processing of your personal data be restricted. You can contact us at any time at the address given in the legal notice. The right to restriction of processing exists in the following cases: • If you dispute the accuracy of the personal data we hold about you, we will generally need time to verify this. For the duration of the review, you have the right to request that the processing of your personal data be restricted. • If the processing of your personal data was/is occurring unlawfully, you can request that data processing be restricted instead of deletion. • If we no longer need your personal data, but you need it to exercise, defend or assert legal claims, you have the right to request that the processing of your personal data be restricted instead of deletion. • If you have lodged an objection in accordance with Article 21 Para. 1 GDPR, a balance must be made between your interests and ours. As long as it is not yet clear whose interests prevail, you have the right to request that the processing of your personal data be restricted. If you have restricted the processing of your personal data, this data - apart from its storage - may only be used with your consent or to assert, exercise or defend legal claims or to protect the rights of another natural or legal person or for reasons of important public interest of the European Union or a member state.

content.details: The use of contact details published as part of the imprint obligation to send unsolicited advertising and information materials is hereby objected to. The operators of the pages expressly reserve the right to take legal action in the event of unsolicited advertising information being sent, such as spam emails.

content.title: Cookies
content.details: Our websites use what are known as 'cookies'. Cookies are small text files that do not harm your device. They are either stored temporarily for the duration of a session (session cookies) or permanently (persistent cookies) on your device. Session cookies are automatically deleted after your visit. Persistent cookies remain on your device until you delete them yourself or your web browser resolves them automatically. In some cases, cookies from third-party companies may also be stored on your device when you enter our site (third-party cookies). These allow us or you to use certain third-party services (e.g., cookies for processing payment services). Cookies serve various functions. Many cookies are technically necessary because certain website functions would not work without them (e.g., the shopping cart function or displaying videos). Other cookies are used to evaluate user behavior or display advertising. Technically necessary cookies (e.g., shopping cart cookies) are stored on the basis of Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR. The website operator has a legitimate interest in storing cookies for the technically error-free and optimized provision of its services. Other cookies are stored only with your consent on the basis of Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR. Consent can be revoked at any time in the future. You can set your browser to inform you about the setting of cookies and allow cookies only in individual cases, exclude the acceptance of cookies for certain cases or in general, and activate the automatic deletion of cookies when closing the browser. If cookies are deactivated, the functionality of this website may be restricted. If cookies from third-party companies or for analysis purposes are used, we will inform you of this separately within this data protection declaration and, if necessary, request your consent.

content.title: Server Log Files
content.details: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us. These are: Browser type and version, Operating system used, Referrer URL, Hostname of the accessing computer, Time of the server request, IP address. These data are not combined with other data sources. The collection of these data is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR. The website operator has a legitimate interest in the technically error-free presentation and optimization of its website – for this purpose, the server log files must be recorded.

content.title: Contact Form
content.details: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, the information you provide in the inquiry form, including the contact details you provide there, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. We do not pass on this data without your consent. The processing of these data is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR, if your request is related to the fulfillment of a contract or is necessary for the implementation of pre-contractual measures. In all other cases, the processing is based on our legitimate interest in the effective processing of the inquiries addressed to us (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR) or on your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR), if this has been requested. The data entered by you in the contact form will remain with us until you request us to delete it, revoke your consent to storage, or the purpose for data storage no longer applies (e.g., after your inquiry has been processed). Mandatory legal provisions – in particular retention periods – remain unaffected.

content.title: Inquiries via E-Mail, Phone or Fax
content.details: If you contact us via e-mail, phone or fax, your inquiry, including all personal data resulting from it (name, inquiry), will be stored and processed by us for the purpose of handling your request. We do not pass on this data without your consent. The processing of these data is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR, if your request is related to the fulfillment of a contract or is necessary for the implementation of pre-contractual measures. In all other cases, the processing is based on your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR) and/or on our legitimate interests (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR), as we have a legitimate interest in the effective processing of the inquiries addressed to us. The data sent by you via contact requests will remain with us until you request us to delete it, revoke your consent to storage, or the purpose for data storage no longer applies (e.g., after your inquiry has been processed). Mandatory legal provisions – in particular statutory retention periods – remain unaffected.

Después de que se haya dado de baja de la lista de distribución del boletín, su dirección de correo electrónico puede ser almacenada en una lista negra por nosotros o el proveedor del servicio de boletines para prevenir envíos futuros. Los datos de la lista negra solo se utilizarán con este propósito y no se fusionarán con otros datos. Esto sirve tanto a su interés como a nuestro interés en cumplir con los requisitos legales al enviar boletines (interés legítimo en el sentido del Art. 6, Párrafo 1, letra f del RGPD). El almacenamiento en la lista negra no tiene un límite de tiempo. Puede oponerse al almacenamiento si sus intereses superan nuestros intereses legítimos.

content.title: Processing Data (Customer and Contract Data)
content.details: We collect, process, and use personal data only to the extent necessary for establishing, content, or changing the legal relationship (inventory data). This is done based on Article 6 Paragraph 1 Letter b of the GDPR, which allows for data processing to fulfill a contract or pre-contractual measures. We only collect, process, and use personal data about the use of this website (usage data) to the extent necessary to enable the user to use the service or to bill for it. The customer data collected will be deleted after the order has been completed or the business relationship has ended. Statutory retention periods remain unaffected.

content.title: Handling Applicant Data
content.details: We offer you the opportunity to apply to us (e.g., by email, post, or via the online application form). Below we will inform you about the scope, purpose, and use of your personal data collected as part of the application process. We assure you that the collection, processing, and use of your data is carried out in accordance with applicable data protection law and all other legal provisions, and that your data will be treated with strict confidentiality.

content.title: Scope and Purpose of Data Collection
content.details: If you send us an application, we process your associated personal data (e.g., contact and communication data, application documents, notes from job interviews, etc.) to the extent necessary to decide on the establishment of an employment relationship. The legal basis for this is Section 26 of the new BDSG under German law (initiation of an employment relationship), Article 6 Paragraph 1 Letter b of the GDPR (general contract initiation), and – if you have given your consent – Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a of the GDPR. Consent can be revoked at any time. Your personal data will only be passed on within our company to people involved in processing your application.

content.title: Data Retention Period
content.details: If we cannot make you a job offer, you reject a job offer, or withdraw your application, we reserve the right to keep the data you have transmitted for up to 6 months based on our legitimate interests (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f of the GDPR) from the end of the application process (rejection or withdrawal of the application). The data will then be deleted, and the physical application documents destroyed. The storage serves particularly for evidentiary purposes in the event of a legal dispute. If it becomes apparent that the data will be required after the 6-month period has expired (e.g., due to an impending or pending legal dispute), deletion will only occur when the purpose for further storage no longer applies. Longer storage can also take place if you have given your consent (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a of the GDPR) or if legal retention obligations conflict with deletion.

content.title: Inclusion in the Applicant Pool
content.details: If we do not make you a job offer, it may be possible to include you in our applicant pool. If you are accepted, all documents and information from the application will be transferred to the applicant pool in order to contact you in the event of suitable vacancies. Inclusion in the applicant pool occurs exclusively on the basis of your express consent (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a of the GDPR). Providing consent is voluntary and has no connection to the ongoing application process. The person concerned can revoke their consent at any time. In this case, the data will be irrevocably deleted from the applicant pool unless there are legal reasons for retention. The data from the applicant pool will be irrevocably deleted no later than two years after consent has been given.

mainH.title: Mundo Tapas Bar & Restaurant in Berlin | Spanish food
paragraphs: At Mundo Tapas, we believe that food is best enjoyed together. In our country, sharing tapas, chatting, and having fun over a plate of bravas and olives—especially with a cold beer—is a way of life. That’s exactly why we created Mundo Tapas bar & restaurant: to bring people together in a warm and inviting space where every meal becomes a moment to remember. For over 10 years, we’ve been serving authentic tapas cuisine with our own special touch. Our menu has evolved to include over 50 tapas, catering to all tastes and occasions. But one thing has never changed—our commitment to quality and freshness.

Every day, our chefs carefully select the finest ingredients and prepare each dish right in front of you, ensuring a truly fresh and flavorful experience. Looking for the best tapas in Berlin? Visit us at Mundo Tapas Alt-Mariendorf, Mundo - Checkpoint Charlie, or Mundo - Potsdamer Platz. Whether you're a local or just visiting, our Spanish restaurants offer the perfect place to relax, share a meal, and enjoy the vibrant flavors of Spain.
mainH.highlight: If you try us once, you might just get hooked—so consider yourself warned!
mainH.closing: Come and enjoy tapas at our place. We’d love to welcome and serve you!

Located in three iconic Berlin locations—Alt-Mariendorf, Checkpoint Charlie, and Potsdamer Platz—our restaurants bring the vibrant spirit of Spain to the heart of the city. Whether you're a local or visiting Berlin, our venues offer an unforgettable dining experience.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Dine with Us?
points: Authentic Spanish Cuisine: Every dish is prepared using traditional recipes passed down through generations.
Fresh, High-Quality Ingredients: From the finest olive oil to the freshest seafood, we source the best for an unparalleled dining experience.
Ambiance Inspired by Spain: Our restaurant is designed to transport you to the streets of Barcelona or the markets of Madrid.

specialties.title: Our Specialties
points: Paella Valenciana: A feast for the senses with saffron-infused rice, succulent seafood, and tender chicken.

Sangria & Spanish Wines: Pair your meal with our handcrafted Sangria or an exquisite selection of Spanish wines.
